name: ichiran-node
description: Node.js/TypeScript port of Ichiran Japanese text segmentation library

scripts.build: cd packages/core && bun run build && cd ../grammar && bun run build && cd ../api && bun run build && cd ../cli && bun run build && cd ../data && bun run build
scripts.typecheck: cd packages/core && bun run typecheck && cd ../grammar && bun run typecheck && cd ../api && bun run typecheck && cd ../cli && bun run typecheck && cd ../data && bun run typecheck
scripts.test: cd packages/core && bun test tests/ && cd ../grammar && bun test tests/ && cd ../cli && bun test tests/ && cd ../data && bun test tests/
